apple_vendor_description: This heartfelt emoji, as seen on Apple devices, showcases a loving embrace between a man and a woman, each rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth, rounded forms and realistic lighting. The medium-dark skin tone of the man and the medium skin tone of the woman are depicted with subtle shading and soft gradients, emphasizing diversity and inclusion. The bright red heart, glowing with a glossy finish at their center, powerfully communicates love, romance, and a deep, supportive bond.
